page.title: 01Summary of Our Area
page.content:
The land of our area is mainly coastal and farmland.It is situated in the{North East}of Scotland,roughly 3 to 4 miles{South East}of the town of Fraserburgh.Most people live in the village of{St Combs}which has a population of over{800}people.
{Commercial fishing is no longer {an important part of village life but {still has its place in the traditions {and customs of the area. About 25 {people are full time fishermen.Some {people still have small vessels for {lobsters and salmon.
The village is now really a{commuter area feeding various places between and including,{Fraserburgh,Peterhead {and{Aberdeen.
